briefTitle: Registry of Mastectomy for Breast Cancer Risk Reduction
officialTitle: Registry of Mastectomy for Breast Cancer Risk Reduction
conditions: Quality of Life, Mastectomy, Breast Neoplasms, Genetic Predisposition to Disease, Adjustment Disorder
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The primary study endpoint is the quality of life of the individual patient at the end of one year. Quality of life is measured using standardized self-report instruments administered preoperatively and in annual follow-up.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients at an elevated risk for breast cancer.

Exclusion Criteria:

* None.
